version_description:
Some additional bug fixes for iOS5 users in addition to the version 2.0 content:

Jump for joy with Sonic Jump’s biggest update yet!

• Mechanical Zone unlocked! A brand new zone for you to master with Sonic and his friends!
• Game Over but want to keep going? Watch a quick video for another chance to continue!
• Fixes and refinements to improve your experience
We've been busy jumping around squashing bugs and eating chilli dogs.
We've been busy jumping around squashing bugs and eating chilli dogs.
